title: Word Guessing Game
description: See if you can guess the words. App demonstrating the use of pure javascript.

title: RPG Game
description: See if you can outlast your opponent who ever that may be. Usage of jquery.

title: Trivia Game
description: Take a quiz and see how much of a minimalist you are. Demonstrating the use of momentum and jquery.

title: Gif Generator
description: An app that pulls in gifs, what ever that gif may be. Showing the usage of an API call and rendering using jquery and javascript.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Multiplayer Game
description: Challenge a friend to Rock Paper Scissors online. An app connected to Firebase online.

title: What's Cooking App
description: A recipe app that allows you to group, edit, and save to a deck app. Demonstrating a group project collaboration within Github.

title: Liri Bot
description: A bot that will console out different information that is tied to APIs. Connected using API calls within the Node.js server.

title: Bamazon App
description: This is a Command Line Interface app which will work a lot like a purchasing terminal deomonstrating the use of node.js which is connected to MySQL database

title: Friend Finder
description: Looking for friends. Look no further. Here is app that will take in a survey. Demonstrating MySQL and javascript.

title: Burgers
description: Here is a menu style app that will help you track your burgers! Showing usage of Express, Node.js, and javascript working together.

title: Prodigies
description: A spot where you can find kid friendly games and ratings. Another group project combining Express, Node.js, Handlebars, and Javascript within a group project.

title: News Scraper
description: Scrape news articles then add notes to them. Project which uses Node.js, Handlebars, Mongo, and Javascript.

title: Clicky Game
description: A game to test your memory. A project which uses React.

title: eQuipt
description: A great way for LARPs (Live Action Role Players) to keep stock of their inventory and even give some to other players. A project which uses the full MERN stack (Mongo, Express, React, Node).
